name: Knee Deep (itch)
description:
Low effort prototype of an idea I had to do a real-time (not turn based) fantasy themed survival rogue-like game. 

Controls:

Move - WASD or gamepad left stick

Run - Shift or gamepad square/X/Y

Toggle Inventory - I or gamepad triangle/Y/X

Drop Reagents in Pot - Space or gamepad cross/A/B

Story:
You are an intern to an Alchemist with a lot of reagent needs. Go forth and do his bidding (collect the junk he asks and maybe more) to earn table scraps to stay alive.

Reagents spawn every day after dawn and at night after dusk. Go gather reagents and return them to the Alchemist's cauldron so that he will give you food to survive on. What an existence... perhaps later you may learn to survive on your own...
